Class InputString

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tlabs.rootvole.InputString

  • public class InputString
extends java.lang.Object
    An input string represents an input for the parser.

    burkhardt.felix

        inputString - The complete input String.

      • getCombinations

        public java.util.Vector<MultiStringWord> getCombinations(int depth)
        Get all string combinations for a specific context depth for this input.
        Parameters:
        depth - The depth, e.g. "2" for search on maximal 2-word string.
        Returns:
        The vector of sub strings, e.g. "alfa", "alfa romeo", "romeo" for "alfa romeo"
